title: NinaWitch Ritual
subtitle: Ritual designed exclusively for you
priceNote: Price: Contact for details. Pricing varies depending on your wishes and personal story.
note:
Note:
All accepted cases will go through a review process to ensure your story aligns with the benevolent purpose that NiNa upholds.
Requests that may negatively impact the blessings or spiritual integrity of either side will not be accepted.

section1.title: Section 1
lines: There are desires that cannot be spoken with words.
There are knots that cannot be untied by reason.
There are paths that only rituals can reveal.
"If you feel the calling — I will be the one to open the gate for you."
section1.desc: This ritual is a unique energy ceremony, handcrafted by NiNawitch — based on the energy, intentions, and timing of each individual receiving it.
section1.button: I am ready to step into the ritual.

section2.title: Section 2
points: • A ritual crafted uniquely for you — never mass-produced.
• Based on: your personal energy goals (love, healing, attraction, etc.), the optimal timing (aligned with lunar cycles and cosmic energies), and the intuitive guidance of NiNawitch.
• After the ritual is completed, you will receive:
• A special spell, potion, oil, or a personalized Sigil Grimoire (depending on the energy focus of each cycle, NiNa will adjust and send you the item that best suits your current needs).

section3.title: Section 3
section3.header: Who Should Step into This Ritual?
points: • You are preparing to transition into a new chapter of your life.
• You feel "out of alignment" and seek to reconnect.
• You wish to cleanse negative energies that are blocking you.
• You are in love, in pain, or in fear — and need a ritual of healing.
• Or... you simply feel, "I need something — something I cannot yet name."

section5.title: Section 5
section5.name: Full Name
section5.wish: What do you wish to manifest through this ritual?
section5.block: What do you sense is standing in your way?
section5.button: Send the ritual into the universe

section6.title: Section 6
lines: A ritual is a meeting between your soul and the higher realms of energy.
I do not promise miracles — but if your heart is true, the ritual will guide you to where you are meant to be.
